guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: The beast is Nero & the Roman empire. But all nations are run by the devil in the same way. That comment was merely a warning against statolatry.

post.meta_title: Mark of the Beast Revealed – Rival Nations
post.title: Mark of the Beast Revealed

body:
If you have any math or science background, you will be intrigued by this to say the least:

https://www.forbes.com/sites/kevinknudson/2015/10/29/devilish-trigonometry-linking-the-number-of-the-beast-and-the-golden-ratio/

It shows that

sin(666 deg) = -phi/2

The sign/sin of 666 is the additive inverse of the divine proportion. 

Moreover all modern jewish products must have some logo with gematria equating to 666 in English/Hebrew. They froth at the mouth for their antichrist to lead them. 

Jesus Christ said that 666 is the number of a man because the antichrist is a man. 

Muhammad sallahu alayhi wasalam clarified who the antichrist is, what he will do on Earth, and how to protect yourself from his trial. He is a one-eyed stubby jew who will tell people he is Jesus and then tell people that he is God. Jesus will return to slay this antichrist. 

The best advice to save yourself from the trials of the antichrist is to recite or memorize Surah al Khaf (Chapter of the Cave). That chapter of the Quran is named after an incident wherein a group of young Christian men who retreated into a cave, in fear of the local pagan king, slept for over 300 years as a miracle of God.

God made an excellent story of them, and He protected them from the persecution that they feared.

There is no deity except for God, and Jesus and Mohamed were his final messengers.
body_html:
If you have any math or science background, you will be intrigued by this to say the least:

https://www.forbes.com/sites/kevinknudson/2015/10/29/devilish-trigonometry-linking-the-number-of-the-beast-and-the-golden-ratio/

It shows that

sin(666 deg) = -phi/2

The sign/sin of 666 is the additive inverse of the divine proportion.

Moreover all modern jewish products must have some logo with gematria equating to 666 in English/Hebrew. They froth at the mouth for their antichrist to lead them.

Jesus Christ said that 666 is the number of a man because the antichrist is a man.

Muhammad sallahu alayhi wasalam clarified who the antichrist is, what he will do on Earth, and how to protect yourself from his trial. He is a one-eyed stubby jew who will tell people he is Jesus and then tell people that he is God. Jesus will return to slay this antichrist.

The best advice to save yourself from the trials of the antichrist is to recite or memorize Surah al Khaf (Chapter of the Cave). That chapter of the Quran is named after an incident wherein a group of young Christian men who retreated into a cave, in fear of the local pagan king, slept for over 300 years as a miracle of God.

God made an excellent story of them, and He protected them from the persecution that they feared.

There is no deity except for God, and Jesus and Mohamed were his final messengers.

post.title: Mark of the Beast Revealed

body:
This is just one way out of several to explain revelation. We can not say that this is the only right one. If you look at the world around us, I see this whole fake pandemic as a rehearsal for the final domination of world under one government, and the introduction of antichrist. On that site, everything is explained as symbols, but in reality you don't have to use any symbols to see it. People are being restricted from restaurants, shops, cinemas, for not being vaccinated on bigger and bigger scale. For now we don't have anything in our hands, or on forehead (and I personally think that this vaccine is not the sign of the beast, though I saw people who think so) but that might be a thing of two-three years until chips are given into people's body with everything about them. Moreover, that site doesn't say a thing about the false prophet, and the punishments obviously didn't happen yet. Not to mention that 'soon' doesn't really mean anything. It doesn't specify the time. Jesus said he will return soon. In that case, soon is at least 2000 years. 

Other thing that points to the 'last days' being near is the stuff, that is talked about on SuspiciousObservers channel (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rEv3HRIVPUQ). What is soon about to happen to our Sun and Earth is literally described in Revelation in one of the seals (Revelation‬ ‭6:12-17).  I think though that to understand this video, it is needed to check out other content on that channel.

I think though that to understand this video, it is needed to check out other content on that channel.

body:
> There is no reason to interpret the “mark” as literal when we don’t interpret the beast as a literal animal with 7 heads.

I don't see a reason to think this cannot or will not be literal, since the anti-Christ is to be a literal man

although I do think it will be introduced in some kind of unexpected way because many of us are aware and awake as to what an obvious mark would look like

body: The only times "antichrist" is used in the whole Bible are in 1 John (and once in 2 John). In all of those cases it refers to any enemy of Christ, not a specific person.
body_html: The only times "antichrist" is used in the whole Bible are in 1 John (and once in 2 John). In all of those cases it refers to any enemy of Christ, not a specific person.

body:
Early sources identified him as Nero or Caligula. During the reformation the papacy was suggested. It's very likely not a single person but "he" is society or evil itself which will exposed and destroyed upon the Lord's return.

2 Thessalonians is of dubious authenticity regardless, and probably just as altered as Paul's real letters. To me this entire chapter reads like a direct attack on later gnostic beliefs which probably didn't exist in Paul's time.
body_html:
Early sources identified him as Nero or Caligula. During the reformation the papacy was suggested. It's very likely not a single person but "he" is society or evil itself which will exposed and destroyed upon the Lord's return.

2 Thessalonians is of dubious authenticity regardless, and probably just as altered as Paul's real letters. To me this entire chapter reads like a direct attack on later gnostic beliefs which probably didn't exist in Paul's time.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.title: Mark of the Beast Revealed

body:
Catholic tradition holds it to be a specific person I believe

>  Francisco Suárez maintains that it is of faith that Antichrist is an individual person, a signal enemy of Christ. This excludes the contention of those who explain Antichrist either as the whole collection of those who oppose Jesus Christ, or as the Papacy. 

https://www.newadvent.org/cathen/01559a.htm

> The word Antichrist occurs only in the Johannine Epistles; but there are so-called real parallelisms to these occurrences in the Apocalypse, in the Pauline Epistles, and less explicit ones in the Gospels and the Book of Daniel.
body_html:
Catholic tradition holds it to be a specific person I believe

Francisco Suárez maintains that it is of faith that Antichrist is an individual person, a signal enemy of Christ. This excludes the contention of those who explain Antichrist either as the whole collection of those who oppose Jesus Christ, or as the Papacy.

https://www.newadvent.org/cathen/01559a.htm

The word Antichrist occurs only in the Johannine Epistles; but there are so-called real parallelisms to these occurrences in the Apocalypse, in the Pauline Epistles, and less explicit ones in the Gospels and the Book of Daniel.

parent.body: The only times "antichrist" is used in the whole Bible are in 1 John (and once in 2 John). In all of those cases it refers to any enemy of Christ, not a specific person.
parent.body_html: The only times "antichrist" is used in the whole Bible are in 1 John (and once in 2 John). In all of those cases it refers to any enemy of Christ, not a specific person.

post.meta_title: Mark of the Beast Revealed – Rival Nations
post.title: Mark of the Beast Revealed

body:
"And then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will kill with the breath of his mouth and bring to nothing by the appearance of his coming." 

So when did this happen?
body_html:
"And then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord Jesus will kill with the breath of his mouth and bring to nothing by the appearance of his coming."

So when did this happen?

parent.body:
Early sources identified him as Nero or Caligula. During the reformation the papacy was suggested. It's very likely not a single person but "he" is society or evil itself which will exposed and destroyed upon the Lord's return.

2 Thessalonians is of dubious authenticity regardless, and probably just as altered as Paul's real letters. To me this entire chapter reads like a direct attack on later gnostic beliefs which probably didn't exist in Paul's time.
parent.body_html:
Early sources identified him as Nero or Caligula. During the reformation the papacy was suggested. It's very likely not a single person but "he" is society or evil itself which will exposed and destroyed upon the Lord's return.

2 Thessalonians is of dubious authenticity regardless, and probably just as altered as Paul's real letters. To me this entire chapter reads like a direct attack on later gnostic beliefs which probably didn't exist in Paul's time.

body: Ye, he is still to return eventually. But that doesn't mean everything in Revelation hasn't happened yet. It's actually logical that a prophecy for people living in the Roman Empire would primarily focus on events they are to live through soon. It was addressed to the seven assemblies in Asia, for whom events outside of their time mean nothing aside from the master's eventual return.
body_html: Ye, he is still to return eventually. But that doesn't mean everything in Revelation hasn't happened yet. It's actually logical that a prophecy for people living in the Roman Empire would primarily focus on events they are to live through soon. It was addressed to the seven assemblies in Asia, for whom events outside of their time mean nothing aside from the master's eventual return.

author.bio:
Professional Chrischan. Striving for post-Enlightenment reconciliation. I love Jesus and hate the antichrist. ✝️ #NotAll

Gab: https://gab.com/stevejail
author.bio_html:
Professional Chrischan. Striving for post-Enlightenment reconciliation. I love Jesus and hate the antichrist. ✝️ #NotAll

Gab: https://gab.com/stevejail

body:
It was literal, the mark is a reference to a historical figure of the time, Nero Caesar, who persecuted Christians and burned down Rome. We're actually fairly certain of this, because there are two different versions of the manuscript tradition, 666 and 616, both of them when transliterated from Greek to Hebrew read as one of his names.

There's no reliable way to create a literal modern reading, though.
body_html:
It was literal, the mark is a reference to a historical figure of the time, Nero Caesar, who persecuted Christians and burned down Rome. We're actually fairly certain of this, because there are two different versions of the manuscript tradition, 666 and 616, both of them when transliterated from Greek to Hebrew read as one of his names.

There's no reliable way to create a literal modern reading, though.

parent.body:
> There is no reason to interpret the “mark” as literal when we don’t interpret the beast as a literal animal with 7 heads.

I don't see a reason to think this cannot or will not be literal, since the anti-Christ is to be a literal man

although I do think it will be introduced in some kind of unexpected way because many of us are aware and awake as to what an obvious mark would look like
parent.body_html:
There is no reason to interpret the “mark” as literal when we don’t interpret the beast as a literal animal with 7 heads.

I don't see a reason to think this cannot or will not be literal, since the anti-Christ is to be a literal man

although I do think it will be introduced in some kind of unexpected way because many of us are aware and awake as to what an obvious mark would look like
